column4: when attempting to install kubuntu I get a message saying unable to fetch all archives, any ideas
what file are you trying to install ?
can you post your /etc/apt/sources.list to www.pastebin.ca then post the link it spits out here ?
http://pastebin.ca/13990
sorry i will post the apt source now
that crappy us.ubuntu mirror is out most of the time
just edit that file and get rid of the us. part of all your lines in the apt/sources.list file
here is the source list http://pastebin.ca/13991
here is my sources.list file >> http://pastebin.ca/13992
comment out/replace your with mine. then apt-get update && apt-get install kubuntu-desktop
I tried still same message, Any other ideas?
did you apt-get update ?
your running hoary or warty ?
try apt-get upgrade
I have ubuntu installed via VMWARE on a WINXP_PRO system.  Could that effect the KUBUNTU install?
your running ubuntu from vmware ?
have you booted into Ubuntu ?
No, I installed with the ISO file on a vitual machine
that's important, you need to re-start your comp and boot into Ubuntu :)
is this the live cd your running or did you actually install /
re-boot your computer and you will be presented with a choice of which operating system you want to launch ....select Ubuntu
